DOC.brief_summary: Background : There scarce evidence regard necessity antibiotic prophylaxis manual revision uterus labor case residual placenta . Methods : randomize control trial parturients placenta separate suspected residual placenta divide randomly two group : ( 1 ) Revision uterus Manual lysis without antibiotic prophylaxis ; ( 2 ) Revision uterus Manual lysis antibiotic prophylaxis follow : 24 hour coverage Ampicillin 2 grams*4 , Gentamycin 240 mg*1 , Clindamycin 600 mg*3 . In case allergy Penicillin antibiotic regimen : Gentamycin 240 mg*1 , Clindamycin 600 mg*3 . Outcomes : Puerperal fever , endometritis , length hospitalization labor , recurrent hospitalization first 2 week discharge .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Antibiotics Manual Removal Retained Placenta Vaginal Birth : Randomized Controlled Trial
